definition: If you don't want anyone to know, don't do it (idiom). fig. If you do something bad, people will inevitably hear about it.
pinyin: ruo4 yao4 ren2 bu4 zhi1 , chu2 fei1 ji3 mo4 wei2
simplified: 若要人不知，除非己莫为
word: 若要人不知，除非己莫為

definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
